pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchanto sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upagacchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena tasmiṃ gāme aññatarissā itthiyā āvasathāgāraṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.4: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—“sace te, bhagini, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṃ āvasathāgāre”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.6: Aññepi addhikā yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ itthiṃ etadavocuṃ—“sace te, ayye, agaru vaseyyāma ekarattaṃ āvasathāgāre”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.7: “Eso kho ayyo samaṇo paṭhamaṃ upagato; sace so anujānāti, vaseyyāthā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.8: Atha kho te addhikā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavocuṃ—“sace te, bhante, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṃ āvasathāgāre”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.10: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmante anuruddhe saha dassanena paṭibaddhacittā ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.11: Atha kho sā itthī yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca—“ayyo, bhante, imehi manussehi ākiṇṇo na phāsu viharissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.12: Sādhāhaṃ, bhante, ayyassa mañcakaṃ abbhantaraṃ paññapeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.14: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmato anuruddhassa mañcakaṃ abbhantaraṃ paññapetvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattā gandhagandhinī yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.15: “ayyo, bhante, abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko, ahañcamhi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.17: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā anuruddho tuṇhī ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.19: tatiyampi kho sā itthī āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.20: “ayyo, bhante, abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko, ahañcamhi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.21: Sādhu, bhante, ayyo mañceva paṭicchatu sabbañca sāpateyyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.22: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā anuruddho tuṇhī ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.23: Atha kho sā itthī sāṭakaṃ nikkhipitvā āyasmato anuruddhassa purato caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.24: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho indriyāni okkhipitvā taṃ itthiṃ neva olokesi napi ālapi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.25: Atha kho sā itthī—“acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.26: Bahū me manussā satenapi sahassenapi pahiṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.27: Ayaṃ pana samaṇo—mayā sāmaṃ yāciyamāno—na icchati mañceva paṭicchituṃ sabbañca sāpateyyan”ti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.28: sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā āyasmato anuruddhassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.29: “accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ yāhaṃ evamakāsiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.30: Tassā me, bhante, ayyo accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.31: “Taggha tvaṃ, bhagini, accayo accagamā yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ yā tvaṃ evamakāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.32: Yato ca kho tvaṃ, bhagini, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosi, taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.33: Vuddhi hesā, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti āyatiñca saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.34: Atha kho sā itthī tassā rattiyā accayena āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā, āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.35: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ itthiṃ āyasmā anuruddho dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.36: Atha kho sā itthī—āyasmatā anuruddhena dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā—āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.38: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya—‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.39: evamevaṃ ayyena anuruddhena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.40: Esāhaṃ, bhante, taṃ bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.41: Upāsikaṃ maṃ ayyo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.42: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.43: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.44: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.45: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.46: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, anuruddha, mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.48: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā …pe… kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, anuruddha, mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.50: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:1.51: “Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:2.1.6: manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā; antamaso tadahujātāpi dārikā, pageva mahattarī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:2.1.13: Mātugāme nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:2.1.14: Bhikkhu nipanne mātugāmo nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:2.2.1: Mātugāme mātugāmasaññī sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:2.2.2: Mātugāme vematiko sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:2.2.3: Mātugāme amātugāmasaññī sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc6:2.2.5: Yakkhiyā vā petiyā vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatitthiyā vā sahaseyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
